title: feeling sound
author: feeling sound
content: I can't even believe that 7 Year have passed.This time has brought a lot of events.Finally , The long-awaiting POS come soon and Ethereum will go green. Analysis Ethereum , I realized that if you take into account all the tokens issued on Ethereum Network as well as Defi , DEX sidechains, L2, etc..Ethereum is #1 in termsÂ  of trading volume and network usage. Even the majority of BUSD is issued on the Ethereum Network.Let's congratulate Ethereum , the Ethereum team and the entire Ethereum community together hope the bast is ahead !What you think will happen after the transition to POS?What price could be in the next Bull Season?

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: Try to write about this news in the official threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=428589.25900I hope that no serious bugs will appear in the ecosystem, otherwise we are in for big problems.Because all L2 solutions depend on this ecosystem.
